document.discussion_title: AI Tech Startup Releases Twitter Data on All 2016 Election Candidates | AboNewsCast
document.topic_text: AI Tech Startup Releases Twitter Data on All 2016 Election Candidates All eight candidates tracked live We cut through the confusion to give the public insights based on data alone; no marketing, no agenda. San Francisco, CA (PRWEB) August 17, 2016 The artificial intelligence company originally launched the site in mid July focussing on the Republican Party’s Donald Trump and the Democratic Party’s Hillary Clinton. Aicial Co-Founder and CEO, Troy Kelly said with ongoing accusation of media bias from all participants in the presidential election, we wanted to road test our platform and provide easily accessible, unbiased monitoring and analysis of social media traffic at 2016tweets.live . “Aicial is bringing clarity to an environment often too…
document.post: AI Tech Startup Releases Twitter Data on All 2016 Election Candidates All eight candidates tracked live We cut through the confusion to give the public insights based on data alone; no marketing, no agenda. San Francisco, CA (PRWEB) August 17, 2016 The artificial intelligence company originally launched the site in mid July focussing on the Republican Party’s Donald Trump and the Democratic Party’s Hillary Clinton. Aicial Co-Founder and CEO, Troy Kelly said with ongoing accusation of media bias from all participants in the presidential election, we wanted to road test our platform and provide easily accessible, unbiased monitoring and analysis of social media traffic at 2016tweets.live . “Aicial is bringing clarity to an environment often too…
